DESCRIPTION: Permet de voir les informations du serveur.
INFOS:
**{{name}} - Informations**

👑 | Server owner: **{{owner}}**
🔤 | Server name: **{{name}}**
🕐 | Creation date: **{{date}}**
🛂 | Verification level: **{{verification}}**
🔢 | Number of members: **{{memberCount}}**
👨 | Humans: **{{humans}}**
🤖 | Bots: **{{bots}}**
🔋 | Members statuses: 
- {{eonline}} **{{online}}** online members
- {{ednd}} **{{dnd}}** members in do not disturb
- {{eidle}} **{{idle}}** idle members
- {{estreaming}} **{{streaming}}** streaming members
- {{eoffline}} **{{offline}}** offline member
📌 | Number of channels: **{{channels}}**
📕 | Number of roles: **{{roles}}**
💯 | Number of emojis: **{{emojis}}**
